title: Zoopla Property Scraper
description: Stealthy Zoopla scraper using PlaywrightCrawler with Camoufox for Cloudflare bypass. Extracts property listings with prices, addresses, beds, baths, and details.

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Zoopla search URL to scrape. Example: https://www.zoopla.co.uk/for-sale/property/london/

startUrls.title: Multiple search URLs
startUrls.description: Optional list of multiple Zoopla search URLs to crawl.

results_wanted.title: Maximum listings
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-500).

max_pages.title: Maximum pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search pages to process per URL.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent browser pages. Lower values are more stealthy.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: REQUIRED: Use Apify RESIDENTIAL proxies with UK country code for best results.
